info.title: Consolidation Chart of Accounts - Read
info.description: A consolidation chart of accounts is a systemic grouping of financial statement items that belong together and are used for group reporting and consolidation. For example, the predefined consolidation chart of accounts is Y1.

x-sap-shortText: Read consolidation chart of accounts in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Master Data for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0336)
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
